Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Listen, guy... what’s your name again?

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Uh... It’s Leonard.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Uhh... okay. Do you really want to help her?

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Her, how do you know it’s female? There’s so little...

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: She’s got tits you dumb ass!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Since when were you an entomologist?

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Insectoid or not, she still needs our help.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Not a chance. We’re here to kill this thing and that’s what I plan on doing!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Absolutely not! Insectoids are incredibly rare!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: The opportunity to study her is the chance of a lifetime!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: They live in colonies that are INCREDIBLY defensive.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Passing up an opportunity like this, well… you might as well be burning an entire library of untold knowledge before it’s even written!

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: We promised we’d get rid of their problem, and the way I see it, unless she’s dead, she’s a problem.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Look, we don’t have to “kill her” to get rid of her. She can come with us!

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Come with us..? Are you crazy?!

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Did you not see all the bodies on our merry little stroll through this cave?

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: She’s too dangerous to handle, much less tame.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Unless you want bug barbecue, she’s not tagging along.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: That’s because you lack someone willing to help.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Listen, let me tag along, and I promise I’ll keep her in check!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: This is a once in a lifetime opportunity I can’t pass up, and I’m willing to put in the effort, if you’ll let me.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Eughhhh... fine.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: If I wake up in the middle of the night and find a bloodthirsty cockroach drooling over me... it’s on you lab rat!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: First off, she needs healing.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: She’s pretty cut up, but... i think i might have something here to fix her.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: I keep a good selection of herbs with me from my studies.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: There are a few that have some pain-numbing properties among... other... interesting side effects.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Eughhh, man that stuff smells awful!

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Here. Don’t take it all, now.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: It’s a pretty effective painkiller, if you use the right part of the plant.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Use the wrong part, and it’ll get you high as a kite... if your brain doesn’t shut down first.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: There now. That’s as good insectoid. Just sit still and we’ll be done with this in no time.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Just sit still and we’ll be done with this in no time.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: ...Seems like you got this under control. I’m headed outside...

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Wait! Not yet. I think it’s important that you stay.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Most monsters tend to acclimate to people in their presence when they experience good things.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: I learned that with Fenton, here.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: ...alright fine. If it means she won’t try to eat me, I’ll stay.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: What... what is that?

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: It’s... an old magic item of mine.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: I used it to record a song an old friend taught me.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: I see... I think the insectoid likes it.

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Well, are you gonna give her a name?

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Calling her “the insectoid” is starting to bug me.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: I suppose I could...

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Maybe...

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Ummm... noo... eughh... thats not...

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: How about... Chrysanthemum?

Items.speaker: Emmy
Items.speech: *Emmy humming* Hum... meee...

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: ... Em... Emee?

Items.speaker: MC
Items.speech: Emmy? I suppose it does have a nice ring to it.

Items.speaker: Leonard
Items.speech: Right. Let’s grab her and get out of this death trap!
